title: Distributed Auditability
description:
No common audit standards in funded proposals.

No consistent evaluation of funded proposals.

Funded reporting is manual.

title: Auditing African Proposals, by WADA
description: Difficulty in auditing proposals in a growing community means scalability is affected

title: Treasury & Catalyst Proposal API
description: No public facing directory of all Catalyst proposals and funded projects: limits the potential to audit, iterate, and innovate.

title: PACE: Proposal progress updates
description: Funded proposals need public facing progress updates to inform the community and help them audit their progress

title: The Catalyst Story by Adatruth
description: Voters need accessible, insightful + digestible educational resources to learn about 150+ funded Catalyst project's progress and the system.

title: Financial Audit Taskforce
description: There is currently no financial audit being performed on funded proposals. We want to ensure funds are spent according to budgets as voted.

title: PACE: Proposal media content
description: Proposers lack a way to add media (interviews, demos, article) after the finalizing proposal stage and after funding to help auditing

title: PACE: Proposal completion reports
description: The community currently lacks a way to easily audit the success and outcome of funded proposals

title: Smart Contract Audit Token SCAT DAO
description: Projects receive funding with no clearly defined process to monitor them and ensure funding is properly spent and proposals are completed.

title: FundTrack - Approve Before Spend
description: Donors, UN & NGOs receive accounts after funds are spent, when the horse is out of the barn. Leaving them few options to control RoI.
